did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: ILR School Extension Division Additional Records, 1948-1956

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations (NYSSILR)

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: ILR School Extension Division materials relating to course offerings in labor union leadership and labor union administration.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of material related to ILR School Extension Division's course offerings on labor union leadership and labor union administration. Included are a sample syllabus, information related to work with the International Association of Machinists, and a memorandum on trends in extension programs in unions.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations. Extension and Public Service Division.
New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: ILR School Extension Division Additional Records #/4136m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
